query.pigql: q = load "DPS_CTA_AGGREGATED"; q = filter q by 'Cluster' in {{ selection(Cluster_2) }}; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in {{ selection(Date_of_audit_Year_1) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_3) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_4) }}; q = filter q by 'Province' in {{ selection(Province_5) }}; q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_6) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_8) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_7) }}; q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_9) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_10) }}; q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_11) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_12) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_13) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_subtype' in {{ selection(Customer_subtype_14) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_15) }}; q = filter q by 'Banner' in {{ selection(Banner_16) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_17) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_18) }}; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["2 month ago".."1 month ahead"];r = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["2 month ago".."2 month ago"];w = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["1 month ago".."1 month ago"];c = cogroup q by all, r by all, w by all; c = foreach c generate  ( (sum(w.CTA_Compliance)/count(w))*100) - ((sum(r.CTA_Compliance)/count(r))*100) as 'Percent_Diff';

q = load "DPS_CTA_AGGREGATED"; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_29) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_32) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_34) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_35) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_36) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_37) }}; q = filter q by 'Cluster' in {{ selection(Cluster_2) }}; q = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in {{ selection(Date_of_audit_Year_1) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_3) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_4) }}; q = filter q by 'Province' in {{ selection(Province_5) }}; q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_6) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_8) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_7) }}; q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_9) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_10) }}; q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_11) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_12) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_13) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_subtype' in {{ selection(Customer_subtype_14) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_15) }}; q = filter q by 'Banner' in {{ selection(Banner_16) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_17) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_18) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_20) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_31) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_33) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_27) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_26) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_28) }}; q = group q by 'Channel'; q = foreach q generate 'Channel' as 'Channel', sum('CTA_Message') as 'sum_CTA_Message', sum('CTA_Compliant') as 'sum_CTA_Compliant',  sum('CTA_Compliant')/sum('CTA_Message') as 'avg_CTA_Compliant';  q = limit q 2000;

q = load "DPS_CTA_RAW"; q = filter q by 'Cluster' in {{ selection(Cluster_2) }}; q = filter q by 'Country' in {{ selection(Country_3) }}; q = filter q by 'Region' in {{ selection(Region_4) }}; q = filter q by 'Province' in {{ selection(Province_5) }}; q = filter q by 'City' in {{ selection(City_6) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_territory' in {{ selection(Sales_territory_8) }}; q = filter q by 'Sales_area' in {{ selection(Sales_area_7) }}; q = filter q by 'Trade_Format' in {{ selection(Trade_Format_9) }}; q = filter q by 'Channel' in {{ selection(Channel_10) }}; q = filter q by 'Subchannel' in {{ selection(Subchannel_11) }}; q = filter q by 'X4P_5P_6P' in {{ selection(X4P_5P_6P_12) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_type' in {{ selection(Customer_type_13) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer_subtype' in {{ selection(Customer_subtype_14) }}; q = filter q by 'Customer' in {{ selection(Customer_15) }}; q = filter q by 'Banner' in {{ selection(Banner_16) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_division' in {{ selection(Product_division_17) }}; q = filter q by 'Product_category' in {{ selection(Product_category_18) }};  cur = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["2 months ago".."2 months ago"]; last = filter q by date('Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Day') in ["3 months ago".."3 months ago"]; diff = group cur by 'CTA_Message', last by 'CTA_Message'; diff = foreach diff generate last.CTA_Message as 'CTA_Message', (avg(cur['CTA_Compliant'])-avg(last['CTA_Compliant'])) as 'Percent_Diff';

q = foreach q generate 'Date_of_audit_Year' as 'Date_of_audit_Year', 'Date_of_audit_Month' as 'Date_of_audit_Month', 'Date_of_audit_Year' + "~~~" + 'Date_of_audit_Month' as 'Date_of_audit_Year~~~Date_of_audit_Month', sum('CTA_Message') as 'sum_CTA_Message', sum('CTA_Compliant') as 'sum_CTA_Compliant',  sum('CTA_Compliant')/sum('CTA_Message') as 'avg_CTA_Compliant'; parameters.text: This chart displays the percentage of CTA availability in the latest month.

This chart displays the list of percentages of CTA availability grouped by each question
for the latest month, and also the percentage increase or decrease compared to the previous month.

This chart displays the percentage of enrolled stores that were Proposition
compliant grouped by categories for the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of enrolled stores that were Proposition
compliant grouped by top customers for the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of CTA availability grouped by
categories for the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of CTA availability grouped by
top customers for the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of enrolled stores that were Proposition
compliant grouped by regions of the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of enrolled stores that were Proposition
compliant grouped by channels for the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of CTA availability grouped by
channels for the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of CTA availability grouped by
regions of the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of CTA availability grouped by
4P, 5P and 6P stores for the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of CTA availability for the
country over a period of last 12 months.

This chart displays the percentage of 4P, 5P and 6P stores that were
Proposition compliant for the country in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of enrolled stores that were
Proposition compliant in the latest month.

This chart displays the percentage of enrolled stores that were
Proposition compliant for the country over a period of last 12 months.
